item.title: Isis FG add a quote by Nora Roberts
item.description:
"((Doc is getting ready to do a Pap-smear on Reece))
"Looks healthy," Doc commented.
"Good, because it hasn't been getting any exercise in quite a while." When she heard Willow smother a laugh, Reece just closed her eyes. She had to remember some old saying about being careful of thoughts. They become words." -- Nora Roberts

item.title: Isis FG add a quote by Nora Roberts
item.description: "Damn me to hell or take me to heaven, but for Gods sake, do it now...." -- Nora Roberts

item.title: Isis FG add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "I cannot believe in a God who wants to be praised all the time." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Isis FG add a quote by Stephen Colbert
item.description: "Agnostics are just atheists without balls." -- Stephen Colbert

item.title: Isis FG add a quote by George Carlin
item.description: "Atheism is a non-prophet organization." -- George Carlin

item.title: Isis FG add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "It is not a lack of love, but a lack of friendship that makes unhappy marriages." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Isis FG add a quote by Robert A. Heinlein
item.description: "Love is that condition in which the happiness of another person is essential to your own." -- Robert A. Heinlein

item.title: Isis FG add a quote by Alfred Lord Tennyson
item.description: "Tis better to have loved and lost Than never to have loved at all." -- Alfred Lord Tennyson

item.title: Isis FG add a quote by Nora Roberts
item.description: "Good fiction creates its own reality." -- Nora Roberts

item.title: Isis FG add a quote by Sharon Sala
item.description: "As long as we draw breath, we owe it to the ones we loved and lost to live out our lives without wasting them on regrets." -- Sharon Sala
